sourcesContent:
import '../style/Projects.scss' import packageImg from '../img/package.JPG' import pongImg from '../img/pong.png' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faAngleRight, faAngleLeft } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import {useEffect, useRef} from 'react' function Projects () { let state = 0 let leftButtonRef = useRef() let rightButtonRef = useRef() let projectsList = [ { name: 'Pong Game', img: pongImg, description: 'This is one of my first projects ever. Even though it\' very simple, it marks the first computer games I create ever', id: 1, state: 'before-active' }, { name: 'Pong Game', img: pongImg, description: 'This is one of my first projects ever. Even though it\' very simple, it marks the first computer games I create ever', id: 2, state: 'active' }, { name: 'Pong Game', img: pongImg, description: 'This is one of my first projects ever. Even though it\' very simple, it marks the first computer games I create ever', id: 3, state: 'after-active' } ] if (projectsList.length) { state = 1 } useEffect(() => { leftButtonRef.current.addEventListener('click', ) }) let renderedProjects = [] for (var project of projectsList) { renderedProjects.push(
{project.name} {project.description}
) } return (
{state ?
{renderedProjects}
:
No projects yet But there will be, soon :{')'}
}
) } export default Projects
